attributes.additional_details: After Luiz Suarez was found guilty based on no evidence at all after Patrice Evra has been caught out twice before lying on this racism matter we need some one to look into how the FA make this decision very unfairly, Also how can the FA as Liverpool have stated believe the word of Patrice Evra. We don't need to just look at this but its a starting point in how the FA get away with this and the favouritism of Manchester United and how to FA needs to be reformed/
